Dialogue.Page: Mod: The Outsider Author: Streetlights Behind the Trees
The Outsider is a mod that adds many new features and locations to the surface of Dark Bramble, utilizing a space that is virtually untouched by the base game.
When it was released, The Outsider was the largest story mod the community had seen by a wide margin, and was made entirely without the use of New Horizons.
While it is not maintained on an entirely regular basis, this mod is still an excellent experience that has stayed as a fond memory in the minds of those who played it.
